attributes.action: AI-badge to indicate AI-generated video content
attributes.additional_details: And also media platform owners (e.g. YouTube, Facebook) to control compliance with this requirement by using internal scanning programs to identify AI-generated content in same way as it is in relation to other restirctions.
attributes.background: Require video content creators to put some clearly visible icon indicating the use of AI to generate video and/or voice-overs.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Require generative AI watermarks & ban using people’s likeness without consent
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/736690
